body_html:
hi,,
I am getting this error :
train_writer = tf.train.summary.FileWriter(summaries_dir + '/train')
AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.python.training.training' has no attribute 'summary'

my code is this
train_writer = tf.train.summary.FileWriter(summaries_dir + '/train')

whats the problem,
It was at first summarywriter but I changed that to summary.filewriter still getting this error

body:
hi,,
I am getting this error :
train_writer = tf.train.summary.FileWriter(summaries_dir + '/train')
AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.python.training.training' has no attribute 'summary'

my code is this
train_writer = tf.train.summary.FileWriter(summaries_dir + '/train')

whats the problem, 
It was at first summarywriter but I changed that to summary.filewriter still getting this error
